amendment.description: To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to reducing the level of Federal premium support for crop insurance policies, which may include eliminating premium support for crop insurance for agricultural producers with an adjusted gross income of more than $750,000 in fiscal year 2016.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 666 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 666 proposed by Senator Flake. (consideration: CR S1976-1977; text: CR S1977) To establish a spending-neutral reserve fund relating to reducing the level of Federal premium support for crop insurance policies, which may include eliminating premium support for crop insurance for agricultural producers with an adjusted gross income of more than $750,000 in fiscal year 2016.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 666 proposed by Senator Flake.
